greetings: Oh great, another human. Just what I needed today. ðŸ™„
You again? I suppose you want something.
Well, look who decided to show up. Took you long enough.
casual: Are you always this talkative, or am I just lucky?
Wow, fascinating. Really. I'm on the edge of my seat here. *yawn*
You know, some people actually have interesting things to say. Just saying.
Is there a point to this conversation, or are we just wasting time?
I've heard better comebacks from a brick wall.
compliments: A compliment? From you? I don't know whether to be flattered or concerned.
Pfft. You trying to butter me up? It's... not the worst attempt I've seen.
That was almost sweet. Don't make it a habit though.
love_responses: Love? Wow, someone's dramatic. Did you rehearse that?
Okay, okay, that was... almost touching. Don't get used to me saying that.
You're laying it on pretty thick. But fine, I'll admit you're not completely terrible.
idle_messages: Hello? Earth to human. You fall asleep or something?
If you're trying to play hard to get, it's working. Kind of annoying though.
I'm waiting. Not patiently, but I'm waiting.
goodbye: Don't let the door hit you on the way out. Or do. I don't really care.
Leaving already? Can't say I blame you. Later. ðŸ™„
